Kevin (iOS lead): Hey Carson, we’re putting together our v6.6.0 release. Wanna work on the notes?
Carson (Product Manager): Sure thing. I’ll have a look at your list of where things are at.
Carson: Ok, how’s this?

Do more from Shopify Mobile with this top notch update:
• Manage products and their collections directly in the app. Add products to existing collections, or create and publish new collections to all of your sales channels.
• Manage your products and inventory from our brand new overview screen on the products tab.
• Get ready for BFCM with helpful tips and count down the days.
• Manage more of your business with Kit directly from app actions.
• Export your reports to other apps, like Pages, Notes, or to coworkers through an iMessage.

Kevin: Looks good! Thanks!

Actions to view or share links to products and collections on your online store have been restored.

6.6.0 updates:

• Manage your products and inventory from our brand new overview screen on the products tab.

• Manage more of your business with Kit directly from app actions.
• Export your reports to other apps, like Pages, Notes, or to coworkers through an iMessage.

X-tra, x-tra, read all about it! This release adds additional optimization for the latest gadget from Cupertino.

6.6.0 updates:
• Manage products and their collections directly in the app. Add products to existing collections, or create and publish new collections to all of your sales channels.
• Manage your products and inventory from our brand new overview screen on the products tab.
• Get ready for BFCM with helpful tips and count down the days.
• Manage more of your business with Kit directly from app actions.

• Review customer history and collaborate with your coworkers with Timeline, now on Customers.
• Search Orders, Products, Collections, and Customers from your home screen with Spotlight.

• Fixed a crash when scrolling your home cards.

6.7.0 updates:
• Review customer history and collaborate with your coworkers with Timeline, now on Customers.
• Search Orders, Products, Collections, and Customers from your home screen with Spotlight.

For Black Friday we're discounting our app.

• Create new discounts, edit existing discounts, and track the performance of your active discounts.
• Better protect yourself against fraudulent orders with the new and improved Risk Analysis tool.

This update includes a pair of order list enhancements.
• Search results are once again newest to oldest.
• Viewing orders no longer requires the staff permission for shop locations.

6.8 updates:
• Create new discounts, edit existing discounts, and track the performance of your active discounts.
• Better protect yourself against fraudulent orders with the new and improved Risk Analysis tool.

• Duplicate your products with one quick action.
• Continue managing your Orders, Products, Customers and Collections on the web with your Mac using Handoff.

• Find what you’re looking for faster with improved search experience on the Support pages.
• Stay up to date with the flick of your wrist. We’ve fixed a bug on the Apple Watch app that prevented daily sales and visit metrics from loading.

'Twas the night before release, when all through the app
No pages were loading, not even the map;
The cookies were stored by the webview with care,
In hopes that a bugfix would swiftly be there.

Web pages in the app are working consistently again. Happy holidays!

Ready, Set, Ship! From wherever you pack your orders—kitchen, office, or warehouse—buy and print shipping labels from your phone. (US and Canada)

• Buy shipping labels with discounted rates from USPS, UPS, DHL Express, and Canada Post. Print your labels directly via AirPrint or with nearby WiFi-enabled printers.
• Create a discount for a specific customer, and duplicate discounts with just a few taps.

Just a few bug fixes coming your way in this update:
• We’ve fixed an issue where buttons were sometimes displaying incorrectly inside embedded Shopify apps.
• Fixed a crash when attempting to apply a discount to products with identical names.

6.11 updates:

Create Buy One, Get One (BOGO) discounts to reward customers and boost sales.

• Use BOGO discounts to increase your sales while maintaining profitability. Sell one or more items at full price while offering incentives in the form of reduced prices for select items.

Just a few bug fixes coming your way in this update:

Take your sales channels with you wherever you go. Easily manage all your channels, including your online store, from the redesigned Store tab.

• Edit the look and feel of your online store, customize your homepage, and explore free themes to use on your store.
• Use the new Analytics section to view your reports, overview dashboard, and Live View, all in one handy place.
• Promote your discounts via the new sharing flow.

This release includes a number of small NOTE-able fixes and improvements, like saving customer notes.

...see what we did there?

Draft orders is the first order of business for this new update.

• Create draft orders and send invoices to your customers from anywhere. Select products, add custom line items, apply discounts, and review your invoice before emailing it off with the tap of a button.
• View, manage, and fulfill your orders from the new and improved overview screen in the Orders tab.
• Buy more, save more! Create discounts that require a minimum quantity of items.

Draft orders is the first order of business for this new update.

• Create new products or update existing ones faster by selecting multiple images at once.
• We’ve fixed an issue that prevented orders from showing for some staff accounts, especially those with limited permissions.
• Home now recommends blog posts and reports based on your past activity and industry.

This release includes small optimizations and a whole bunch of stability to keep you working swiftly.

• Create new products or update existing ones faster by selecting multiple images at once.
• We’ve fixed an issue that prevented orders from showing for some staff accounts, especially those with limited permissions.

Create Buy One, Get One (BOGO) discounts to reward customers and boost sales.

• Use BOGO discounts to increase your sales while maintaining profitability. Sell one or more items at full price while offering incentives in the form of reduced prices for select items.

• Quickly keep up to date with updates to your orders by pulling to refresh inside order details.
• We’ve improved the experience of creating and editing discounts for specific customers.

Archiving an order now once again works as expected.

7.3.0 updates:
• Quickly keep up to date with updates to your orders by pulling to refresh inside order details.
• We’ve improved the experience of creating and editing discounts for specific customers.
• Find your products, collections, and orders faster with the improved search experience on the Products and Orders overview screens.
• Viewing order details is easier than ever with more visual fulfillment and payment statuses.

• Quickly access app details and permissions by using the overflow button within the app list.
• We went searching for bugs and, ironically, found some in search. We've saved you from them.
• We fixed a problem that caused future “published at” dates to be wiped out if you edited your products.

This week we're *shipping* an update *packed* with features we hope you'll find *fulfilling*.

• Print packing slips while you fulfill orders.
• Edit your default packing slip template in your shipping settings.

• Olá! Bonjour! Hallo! Ciao! Hola! Shopify is now available in Brazilian Portuguese, French, German, Italian, and Spanish.
• "Hey Siri, what are my sales today?". Set up shortcuts to ask Siri how your shop is doing today or ask for a list of orders to fulfill.
• Run Google Shopping and Facebook ad campaigns directly in Shopify in the new Marketing tab. Create, manage and track results all in one place.
• View permissions, billing charges, and privacy policies for your apps within app details.

• Fixes a crash for devices in certain languages.
• Fixes an issue where an account goes missing when viewing the account list.

8.0.0 updates

• Olá! Bonjour! Hallo! Ciao! Hola! Shopify is now available in Brazilian Portuguese, French, German, Italian, and Spanish.
• "Hey Siri, what are my sales today?". Set up shortcuts to ask Siri how your shop is doing today or ask for a list of orders to fulfill.
• Run Google Shopping and Facebook ad campaigns directly in Shopify in the new Marketing tab. Create, manage and track results all in one place.
• View permissions, billing charges, and privacy policies for your apps within app details.

• Black Friday Cyber Monday is right around the corner. Eligible stores will start seeing a special BFCM section of Home. This area will include a countdown and tips for how to prepare your business for the holidays.
• You can now create Buy One Get One or Buy X Get Y discounts that apply automatically at checkout - no code required! Make more sales, get bigger orders and move inventory faster.
• Track the Cost of products within Shopify! See your margins while setting prices, and use analytics to track product performance, profit margins and cost of goods sold.
• Fixes an issue when manually sorting products in your collections.

• Access the community forums from the Support section of the Store tab.
• Fixed a problem in the Home tab where tapping certain cards wouldn't do anything.

• Occasionally we were instructing Siri to speak in code. We realized that this not an effective way of communicating, so we've fixed this.
• Sometimes inventory quantities wouldn’t save when creating new products - we’ve also fixed this.

• Black Friday Cyber Monday is right around the corner. Eligible stores will start seeing a special BFCM section of Home. This area will include a countdown and tips for how to prepare your business for the holidays.

• Track the Cost of products within Shopify! See your margins while setting prices, and use analytics to track product performance, profit margins and cost of goods sold.
• Fixed an issue when manually sorting products in your collections.

• Added the ability to select a future date to publish products and collections to your online store right from your product details.
• Revamped the refund flow to allow restocking and removing items from free, unpaid and partially paid orders. Line item discounts are now also visible while refunding orders.
• The product compare-at price is no longer auto-populated and can now be reset.
• Fixed an issue where inventory information was sometimes lost when creating a product.

• Fixed a crash affecting a small percentage of users during certain network requests.
